Class Permissions.FilterCommands

Provides commands for managing word filters and automatic bans within guilds.

Provides commands for managing word filters and automatic bans within guilds.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AutoBanWord(string)

Toggles a word on or off the automatic ban list for the current guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoBanWord")]
[Aliases("AutoBanWord")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task AutoBanWord(string word)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string word

The word to toggle on the auto ban list.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

If the word is currently on the list, this command removes it, effectively unblacklisting the word. If the word is not on the list, it adds the word, automatically banning any user who uses it. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.AutoBanWord "example" - Toggles the word "example" on or off the auto ban list.

| Edit this page View Source

AutoBanWordList()

Displays a paginated list of all words on the automatic ban list for the current guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoBanWordList")]
[Aliases("AutoBanWordList")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task AutoBanWordList()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

Requires Administrator permission to execute. Uses an interactive paginator to navigate through the list of banned words.

Examples

.AutoBanWordList - Shows the paginated list of auto ban words.

ChnlFilterInv()

Toggles the invite link filter for a specific channel on or off.

Declaration
[Cmd("ChnlFilterInv")]
[Aliases("ChnlFilterInv")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task ChnlFilterInv()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command allows you to enable or disable invite link filtering on a per-channel basis. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.ChnlFilterInv - Toggles the invite filter for the current channel.

FWarn(string)

Enables or disables warnings for filtered words in the current guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("FWarn")]
[Aliases("FWarn")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task FWarn(string yesnt)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string yesnt

A string indicating whether to enable ("y") or disable ("n") the warning.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.FWarn "y" - Enables warnings for filtered words. .FWarn "n" - Disables warnings for filtered words.

| Edit this page View Source

FilterWord(string?)

Adds or removes a word from the filtered words list in the current guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("FilterWord")]
[Aliases("FilterWord")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task FilterWord(string? word)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string word

The word to toggle on the filtered words list.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

If the word is currently on the list, this command removes it, effectively unfiltering the word. If the word is not on the list, it adds the word to the list. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.FilterWord "example" - Toggles the word "example" on or off the filtered words list.

| Edit this page View Source

FwClear()

Clears all filtered words for the current guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("FwClear")]
[Aliases("FwClear")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task FwClear()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command removes all words from the filtered words list, effectively disabling word filtering until new words are added. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.FwClear - Clears the filtered words list.

SrvrFilterInv()

Toggles the server-wide invite link filter on or off.

Declaration
[Cmd("SrvrFilterInv")]
[Aliases("SrvrFilterInv")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task SrvrFilterInv()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

When enabled, posting invite links to other Discord servers will be automatically blocked. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.SrvrFilterInv - Toggles the server-wide invite filter.

| Edit this page View Source

[Aliases("SrvrFilterLin")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task SrvrFilterLin()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

When enabled, posting any links will be automatically blocked server-wide. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.SrvrFilterLin - Toggles the server-wide link filter.

SrvrFilterWords()

Toggles the server-wide word filter on or off.

Declaration
[Cmd("SrvrFilterWords")]
[Aliases("SrvrFilterWords")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task SrvrFilterWords()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

When enabled, specified words will be automatically blocked server-wide. Requires Administrator permission to execute.

Examples

.SrvrFilterWords - Toggles the server-wide word filter.
